name: Batman versus Predator
overview:
After a hellacious battle with a fierce Predator that almost destroyed Gotham City, Batman narrowly escaped with his life. He thought he had seen the last of the alien beings, but time always has a way of repeating itself...

The Predators, having lost one of their greatest warriors, vowed revenge on the Dark Knight. They gathered together a massive army, and set their sights on Gotham City. The sky began to darken as the Predator army engulfed the entire city. They had only one mission to accomplish... To eliminate Batman!!!

As the bat signal flashed into the sky, Batman had no idea what he was about to face....
